1: <pb/><t>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Dios! Bitnanek bay Dios tac'al bay is templo. Bitnanek bay Cham tac'al bay is cajlobal tol watx'xac'al yili.</t>
2: <t>Bitnejek Cham yuj is yunben c'ayubtak yili. Bitnejek Cham yuj is mimanbilal c'am axca.</t>
3: <t>Bitnejek yin sonal trompeta. Bitnejek yin sonal arpa, c'al yin sonal salterio.</t>
4: <t>Bitnanek yet ipan e canalwi yetok pandereta. Bitnejek Cham yin sonal flauta, c'al yin son ay tx'anil.</t>
5: <t>Bitnejek Cham yetok ch'en platillo tz'inan yul nuk'; bitnejek Cham yetok ch'en platillo tol chi txanani yoc nuk'.</t>
6: <t>Masanil tzet yetal chi yi' is cak'ek', bitnokokab bay Cham. <pb/>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová!</t>
